name: API Gateway
description: Amazon API Gateway is a fully managed service that makes it easy for developers to create, publish, maintain, monitor, and secure APIs.

name: Lambda
description: AWS Lambda is a serverless compute service that runs your code in response to events and automatically manages the underlying compute resources.

name: EC2 Instance
description: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) provides scalable computing capacity in the AWS cloud.

name: S3 Bucket
description: Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) is an object storage service offering industry-leading scalability, data availability, security, and performance.

name: RDS Database
description: Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS) makes it easy to set up, operate, and scale a relational database in the cloud.
